ygData.subject: Awaiting Battle
ygData.msgSnippet: When the preds get there, I think I should post damage for The Cybertronian Fire (me and KSLawdogg designed it, and in his absence, I know the most about it).

When the preds get there, I think I should post damage for The 
Cybertronian Fire (me and KSLawdogg designed it, and in his absence, 
I know the most about it).

::Striker/Prowl/Kluster::

Striker lands outside the Cybertronian Fire, transforming to robot 
mode. He looks around, only seeing one pred, who had Hot Rod's gun 
aimed at its head. Striker looks at Hot Rod. "I take it the rest of 
the preds arn't here yet?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl recieves Arcangel's message. "I think I'm still acting 
commander, Arcangel. I'm not sure though," he replies, "At any rate, 
there are some Predacons marching at the Cybertronian Fire. You might 
wanna help us out."

Prowl enters the bridge, looking at the scanners. The Predacons 
wern't here yet. He arms his gun, running toward the exit of the ship.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster blinks as he hears the comotion over his comm-link. He was 
not expecting such a reaction from the Maximals. Maybe his first 
assumption of the Maximals on this planet was incorrect after all...
